title: Comedians Giving Lectures
overview: Comedians Giving Lectures sees some of the funniest people in British comedy deliver a hilarious stand up presentation in the guise of a lecture.In each episode, host Sara Pascoe gives three comedians the titles of genuine lectures, but none of the content. However, not only have they got to impress the audience with their usual comedy chops, they will also be marked on their oratory skills by experts in the field of their lecture topic.
